findings.message: TASK-01 error contract is internally inconsistent with later TC cases. This line says Octorate errors return per-room `{ available:false, error:"unavailable" }`, but TC-01-04 requires `"rate_limited"` and TC-01-05 requires `{ rooms:{} }`. Split acceptance by error class (calendar-call errors vs auth/token failures) to avoid ambiguous implementation.

TC-04-05 conflicts with sold-out behavior. The plan also requires sold-out buttons be disabled (lines 423, 432), so "GA4 `select_item` fires on NR button click regardless of availability state" is not valid for sold-out/disabled CTAs.

E2E acceptance says verify real navigation to `book.octorate.com`, but the same task's hardening step recommends intercepting/blocking that navigation in CI (line 552). Define separate pass criteria for "redirect attempted" vs "actual external navigation" to avoid non-deterministic tests.
The sanitized evidence requirement for TASK-00 is strong and reduces risk of leaking commercially sensitive live pricing in committed artifacts.
